  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Distribución de probabilidad continua</string>
            <string language="en">Continuous probability distribution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ununterbrochene Wahrscheinlichkeit Verteilung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution continue de probabilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição contínua da probabilidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione continua di probabilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνεχής διανομή πιθανότητας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las distribuciones de probabilidad de variable continua. Se estudia lo que es una variable aleatoria continua y se describe como ejemplo fundamental la distribución Normal o de Gauss.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach continuous variable probability distributions. The concept of continuous random variable is explained and the description of the normal (or Gaussian) distribution is used as the main example.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">distribución de Gauss</string>
            <string language="en">Gaussian distribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">distribuciones</string>
            <string language="en">distributions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">normal</string>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">continua</string>
            <string language="en">continuous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">probabilidad</string>
            <string language="en">probability</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, ununterbrochene variable Wahrscheinlichkeit Verteilungen
zu unterrichten. Das Konzept der stetiger Zufallsvariable wird 
erklärt und die Beschreibung der normalen (oder Gaußschen) 
Verteilung wird als das Hauptbeispiel verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner des distributions variables continues de 
probabilité. Le concept de la variable aléatoire continue est 
expliqué et la description de la distribution normale (ou gaussienne)
est utilisée comme exemple principal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar 
distribuições variáveis contínuas da probabilidade. O 
conceito da variável aleatória contínua é explicado e a 
descrição da distribuição normal (ou gaussian) é usada como o 
exemplo principal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare le distribuzioni variabili continue di probabilità. 
Il concetto della variabile casuale continua è spiegato e la 
descrizione della distribuzione normale (o gaussiana) è usata come 
l'esempio principale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει τις συνεχείς μεταβλητές διανομές πιθανότητας. 
Η έννοια της συνεχούς τυχαίας μεταβλητής εξηγείται και η 
περιγραφή της κανονικής (ή γκαουσσιανής) διανομής 
χρησιμοποιείται για βασικό παράδειγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gaußsche Verteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteilungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ununterbrochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrscheinlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution gaussienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distributions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">probabilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição gaussian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
